string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v62

string-array.name: v62
string-array.item: sixtytwo
If you haven\'t rebooted yet, REBOOT IN 2 MINUTES!
MAJOR DESIGN UPGRADE
New QS toggles
New animated status bar icons
Fix Launcher Wallpaper Chooser FC
Theme Tinfoil for Facebook
Configure Settings\' Battery History Chart Remainder
Fix Browser white on white accent
Fix Dialer In-call Unreadable Text + In-call Backgrounds
Fix up all Dialer\'s styles, letting it have the full Theme.Material styles
Theme CellBroadcastReceiver
Optimize Gmail to tackle FCs and problematic code during updates
Add Benzo Rom specific sidebar drawable to fix FC
Add minimal animated Superuser statusbar icon
Fix Facebook unreadable highlight accent
Remove Threema overlay due to buggy interface, redone, and changed accents
Add some transparency to the popup menu
Clean up framework, fix all DeviceDefault issues and white text on white
Add 95% opacity to notification background
Remove Unused Apex Launcher style
Remove Google Calendar Colors
Remove all Calendar overlays except AOSP Calendar FAB
Add Media Provider into Overlays to fix black on black
Adjust colorAccent value specifically for Settings in FW
Add new Hangouts icons thanks to @jezebelxxx
Fix unreadable text in Hangouts -> Hidden Contacts
Theme Settings Extra Information Popup
Fix invisible Google Translate offline download icon
Theme XDA One
Fix Hangouts video icon white on white
Update cdt activator structure layout
Merge latest notification panel header background
Theme Cyanogen OS 12 Theme Chooser
Add WhatsApp Material colors
Update SuperSU overlay
Update BlissOTA overlay to 4.0.0
[BLISS] Add new Bliss logo into BlissOTA
Control TRDS icon color
Theme Chrome Dev
Theme com.ota.updates on Temasek
Drop reliance on Material Light\'s text color for SystemUI notifications
Whiten typing dots in Hangouts
Add Kernel Adiutor Overlay
[BLISS] Add new screen record icon in Power Menu
[BLISS] Add new Zen icons (Important and None) to Power Menu
Remove thin Bluetooth logo in Status Bar
Change YouTube actionbar to Dark Material Red color
[BLISS] Fix BlissPapers\' Floating Action Button Colors
Fix black expand arrow in Gmail for CC and BCC
Clean project completely, clean up all overlays, minor bugs, etc.
